subject: MTCN Number: Tracking 06188-02
body:
MTCN Number: Tracking 06188-02943
Be informed that the sum of Five thousand United States dollars
{$5000.00USD} has already been sent to you via Western Union Money
Transfer. I was given the mandate to transfer your full overdue
payment worth the total sum of $1.2Million USD via western union by
the State Treasury department.
I tried contacting you to give you the necessary information to pick
up your fund but I couldn't get through yesterday so I decided to
email you the MTCN so that you can pick up the first payment of
$5000.00 and we will be sending you $5000.00 everyday as our daily
transfer limit until you completely receive the total amount of
$1,200,000.00, meanwhile it was agreed that 
you have to obtain a
transfer clearance form and the cost of the certificate is $50.00
before you can pick up your first payment of $5000 at any WU location
around you. Pls take note of this, that you have to pay the $50.00 for
obtaining the clearance form before you can pick up your first
available payment.
Go to any western union office in your location to pick up the
$5000.00 which is currently active and do try to contact me back as
soon as you get this email as the only operation manager in charge of
your payment to carry out the transfer immediately. I will send you
another payment tomorrow once you pick up the first one today which is
after weâ€™ve obtain the transfer clearance form on your behalf from the
Supreme Court of Washington.
Below is the western union information to pick up the $5000.00USD
which you will be receiving daily after you send the clearance
certificate payment of $50.00 to this office.
NOTE: You cannot pick up the payment if the transfer clearance
certificate charge ($50.00) is not paid and that's compulsory.
Track Your first payment of $5000 with below tracking number and website.
https: // www. westernunion.com/web/global-service/track-transfer
Tracking # 06188-02943
Your payment is ready for pick up at any western union location, but
you can't do that without the fee of $50.00 being paid. you can send
the fee of $50.00 through Bitcoin, Cash APP, Zelle or Gift Card such
as Steam or Nordstrom card.
Do get back to me with your details as listed: Phone number, Address.
Regards,
Mr Phillips Lucas
Email:: 
phillipslucas60@gmail.com
Money Transfer | Global Money Transfer | Western Union

subject: Re: MTCN Number: Tracking 06188-02
body:
Hello Mr. Phillips Lucas,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. I appreciate your efforts in transferring the funds to me. However, I have a few questions before proceeding.

1. Can you please provide more details about the State Treasury that authorized this transfer? I would like to know more about their role in this process.

2. What is the purpose of the transfer clearance form? Why is it necessary to obtain it before picking up the first payment?

3. Could you clarify how the daily transfer limit works? How much will be transferred each day until I receive the total amount?

4. Is there any specific reason why the fee for obtaining the clearance form needs to be paid through Bitcoin, Cash APP, Zelle, or Gift Cards? Are there alternative payment methods available?

I look forward to your response and further guidance on how to proceed with this transaction.

Best wishes,
Keri

subject: Re: MTCN Number: Tracking 06188-02
body: I will look into this and get back to you.

subject: Re: MTCN Number: Tracking 06188-02
body:
Hello there! Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your willingness to share information with me. I'm always open to learning new things and exploring different opportunities. Could you please provide me with more details about what you'd like to share? I'm curious to know more so that I can look into it further.

Best wishes,
Keri
